title: Avocado and Chickpea Salad
short_description:
This Avocado and Chickpea Salad is a refreshing and nutritious choice, perfect for a light meal. It combines creamy avocado, protein-rich chickpeas, and a zesty lemon dressing. 
• 1 ripe avocado 
• 400g canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed 
• 1 small red onion, finely chopped 
• A handful of cherry tomatoes, halved 
• Juice of 1 lemon 
• 2 tablespoons olive oil 
• Salt and pepper to taste 
• Fresh parsley, chopped

steps.title: 1. Prepare Ingredients
steps.description: Dice 1 ripe avocado and place in a large bowl. Add 400g drained and rinsed chickpeas, 1 finely chopped small red onion, and a handful of halved cherry tomatoes.

steps.title: 2. Make Dressing
steps.description: In a small bowl, whisk together the juice of 1 lemon, 2 tablespoons of olive oil, and salt and pepper to taste.

steps.title: 3. Combine and Serve
steps.description: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine. Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.
